issue.title: adrum.js - duplicate rule

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

adrum

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/0197651c42753677b62ee94456106c0cf6d3e56b/SpywareFilter/sections/general_url.txt#L334
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/0197651c42753677b62ee94456106c0cf6d3e56b/SpywareFilter/sections/specific.txt#L3284

issue.title: www.canva.com - viewing a design gives a black page
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Annoyances 2.1.54.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.canva.com/design/designID/XYZ/view

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Caused by a mobile-targeting `canva.com#$#body { overflow: auto !important; }` rule, which hides the entire body

2. Screenshots

Screenshot is a little bit useless in this case, as the entire page is black 😅


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Google Play: com.google.android.gm
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.gm](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.google.android.gm) ### Comment Username: @Jonno-C > When adguard is enabled it's stopping me from reducing and sending emails to both of my personal IMAP accounts as well as Hotmail account as well.. when I refresh email it did not refresh . If I send email it never sends.. if I disable adguard it works right away.. I can't see much in the adguard logs either .. > > Also had issues with Android auto so disabled DNS filtering which helped, Ajay issues with WhatsApp not sending images quickly (fiddle adguard and images instantly send) also mygov medicare Australian government app can't login when adguard is laoded due to blocking Google analytics it seems allowed that and seems to be working now... Adguard really seems to be causing some major issues recently... ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ixBoeaN.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/p6XDNMf.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 13 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.11+(54) AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances Userscripts: | disabled Other extensions used: | Emsisoft mobile security

pull_request.title: add hket.com mobile app popup
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147379

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: hket.com mobile app popup
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://inews.hket.com/article/3498981/%E3%80%90%E6%B8%AF%E8%82%A1%E5%B8%82%E6%B3%81%E3%80%91%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%98%E8%B7%8C4-%E3%80%81%E9%98%BF%E9%87%8C%E8%B7%8C%E9%80%BE3-%E3%80%80%E3%80%8C%E4%B8%AD%E5%AD%97%E8%82%A1%E3%80%8D%E9%80%86%E5%B8%82%E5%8F%88%E7%82%92%E4%B8%8A%E3%80%80%E6%81%92%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%8A%E6%97%A5%E8%B7%8C131%E9%BB%9E%EF%BC%88%E4%B8%8D%E6%96%B7%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%EF%BC%89?mtc=20037

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/129025690/229691714-2f175ef5-ec5d-453f-be87-fb459855d1d4.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy
